name: Toot Toot (assertchris)
description:
Made this little game for an educational jam I did with a friend. It took 23 hours and 45 minutes to complete, spread out over about 2 weeks. It was built in Godot 4 alpha 6, which is why there is no web export.

Features I'd like to add:

  • another level or two
  • a transition between menus and levels
  • a pause menu (lol)
  • a frustration system, for when the people wait too long
